item.description:
Join us for an evening of cards (Pitch or Cribbage) on Thursday.

Back by popular demand! Please bring a deck of cards and/or a cribbage board if you have them.

Please note the venue. Tony's Pizza is on Route 146 a few minutes south of the Blackstone Valley Mall.
item.how_to_find_us: Will be in the downstairs dining room.
item.name: Cards - Pitch and/or Cribbage
